name: The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates - An Adventure Game
blurb: An adventure game following Alice and Dorothy through Wonderland and Oz as they try to stop the evil Red Queen of Hearts

rewards.reward: *I Like to Help* You receive "The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates" desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.
*First!* You receive a copy of "The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates" DRM-Free game for PC, Mac or Linux as well as the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*Just The Game, Please*\r\nYou Receive a copy of "The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates" DRM-Free game for PC, Mac or Linux as well as the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*Music, Please* You receive a DRM-Free copy of "The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates" Original Game Soundtrack, a PDF copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, the DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*The T-Shirt Tier* Select a t-shirt from our "The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates" designs! In addition to a PDF copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, a DRM-Free copy of "The Red Queen of Oz: Two Fates" Original Game Soundtrack in addition to the DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*Plush, Please!* You receive a 9" Cheshire Cat plush toy in addition to a t-shirt, a copy of the DRM-Free soundtrack, a PDF copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, the DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*Mini-Me* You get your choice of 2" highly detailed resin miniature of your favorite Oz/Wonderland character! in addition to a 9" Cheshire Cat plush toy, t-shirt, a PDF copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, a copy of the DRM-Free soundtrack, the DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*Statue Stature*\r\nYou receive a finely detailed resin statue of Cheshire Cat as well as the 2" highly detailed resin miniature, t-shirt, plush toy, a PDF copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*Exclusive Tier* *I Want In!*  You will have your likeness drawn into an image appearing in the game along side your favorite Oz/Wonderland character!! This limited edition tier lets you create a "Journal page" that Dorothy, Alice, and friends find while exploring the landscape. When found, a picture of you drawn as one of the many fantastic creatures of Oz or Wonderland along side your favorite character will appear along with a written note you create yourself for the journal! You also get the finely detailed resin statue of Cheshire Cat as well as a PDF copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, the t-shirt, 2" highly detailed resin miniature, plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits. This tier is limited so secure yours now!

*Read-Along* You receive a softcover edition of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel. In addition to the finely detailed resin statue of Cheshire Cat as well as the t-shirt, 2" highly detailed resin miniature, plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

*More Story, Please!* You get a signed Hardcover edition of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel. This is in addition to the Cheshire Cat statue, t-shirt, plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and listing in the exclusive "Extra Special Thanks" section of the game credits!

*Collector Supreme!* You receive the complete set of 12 2" miniatures, a hand-painted Cheshire Cat statue, the signed Hardcover edition of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, t-shirt, the Cheshire Cat  plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and listing in the exclusive "Extra Special Thanks" section of the game credits!

*Let Me Tell You a Story!* You get to submit your own short storyline for an in-game mission and you will be listed in the credits as "Additional Game Missions"! This is in addition to a signed hardcover copy of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, the Cheshire Cat statue, t-shirt, plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game  for PC, Mac or Linux, the desktop wallpaper and listing in the exclusive "Extra Special Thanks" section of the game credits!

*Serious Backer* You get your name listed under the title of "Producer" in the top of the game credits. You also receive a truly unique commission request of Simon to draw almost anything you like! As well as submitting your own story for a mission, the complete miniature collection, signed hardcover edition of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, the Cheshire Cat statue, t-shirt, plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux and the desktop wallpaper.

*I Want It All!* You get your name listed under the title of "Executive Producer" at the top of the game credits. You also get your choice of Oz/Wonderland character to be made into an exclusive 6" resin statue! You also receive a truly unique commission request of Simon to draw almost anything you like! As well as submitting your own story for a mission, the complete miniature collection, signed hardcover edition of "The Red Queen of Oz" graphic novel, the Cheshire Cat statue, t-shirt, plush toy, DRM-Free soundtrack, DRM-Free copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux and the desktop wallpaper.
